title: Game stuck on "Game is still in progress..."
body: I was going to test out a skin I got in a practice game. I wasn't paying attention and realized I didn't equip the skin, so before I even spawned in, I closed League. Now the client thinks I'm still in game even after restarting. How do I fix this?

replies.body: Bump Could not get in a real game ... :( Unfair punishment gonna stack up...

Ahhhh since you opened and closed the practice game so quickly, it might have lingered in the background for a bit. Try starting another game, but definitely, let me know if you still haven't been able to start another game.
